They're easier to manipulate, more desperate, and less likely to be reported missing. My operation is a well-oiled machine, with each location carefully selected to maximize profits and minimize risk. I've honed my skills over the years, and my methods have proven to be highly effective. The fear and suffering of my victims only fuel my ambition, driving me to expand my operation and push the boundaries of what's possible.
